oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Connie B. Gay interviews Eighth United States Army Korean War Soldiers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Connie B. Gay interviews various Eighth United States Army members in Korea, as part of his March 1951 tour to Japan and Korea with Grandpa Jones and his Grandchildren. Broadcast on March 26, 1951.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Connie B. Gay) -- Connie B. Gay interviews Private Eddie L. Bowman -- Connie B. Gay interviews Corporal Paul H. Keller -- Connie B. Gay interviews Private Thomas E. Morris -- Connie B. Gay interviews Corporal Bernard F. King -- Connie B. Gay interviews Private Frederick Bryznyk -- Connie B. Gay interviews Sergeant Charles P. Franks -- Closing statement (Connie B. Gay) -- [Unidentified radio excerpt]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WARL (Radio station : Arlington, Va.); Gay, Connie B. (Connie Barriot), 1914-1989; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998
